sentence.text: The first week I was at the school , I attempted to climb a tree , and was reproved by a horrified prefect .

Raising her eyes , she stared in rather horrified fascination at the opening door .

When I asked if they could make me an identical one trimmed with black fur and beading instead , they were horrified but they agreed in the end . "

If I mention our separate sleeping arrangements to friends , they are horrified .
